name: Tanita: A Plasticine Dream
description: Entertaining story to take part in using crazy machines to interesting puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7 Processor: Pentium IV 2.7 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 9-certified 3D video card (GeForce 6600 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9-certified sound card

reviews.review_text: This game has the classic 'adventure game' problem in which you have no idea what you are supposed to do to progress or even what the puzzles are. There is no dialogue, no hint system, and the surreal world means that you generaly wouldn't be able to guess what the next thing you need to do is.  Additionally, I have been unable to find a complete walkthrough anywhere on the internet. I only reccomend this to hardcore adventure gamers.
